SnippetCode.val:
Imports System Imports System.Net Imports System.IO
Public Class Snippet
Public Shared Function FTPDownloadFile(ByVal user As System.String, ByVal passwort As System.String, ByVal server As System.String, ByVal ServerFileName As System.String, ByVal LocalFileName As System.String, ByVal passive As System.Boolean, ByVal ProtFileName As System.String) As System.String proto("V 2.0 Starte downloadFile " & ServerFileName,ProtFileName) Dim returnstring As String = "" Dim FtpFileUri As Uri Try FtpFileUri = New Uri(server + ServerFileName) Catch ex As Exception Return "#Fehler: URI Format" End Try
proto("ftpfileuri=" & FtpFileUri.ToString,ProtFileName) If (FtpFileUri.Scheme <> Uri.UriSchemeFtp) Then returnstring = "#Falsches URI Schema " & FtpFileUri.ToString proto("Falsches URI Schema",ProtFileName) Else proto("URI Schema OK",ProtFileName) 'Initialisierung des Requests
Dim FtpFileReq As FtpWebRequest = FtpWebRequest.Create(FtpFileUri) proto("Create FTP OK",ProtFileName) FtpFileReq.Credentials = New NetworkCredential(user, passwort) proto("Sicherheit gesetzt",ProtFileName) FtpFileReq.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.DownloadFile proto("Download gestartet",ProtFileName) FtpFileReq.UseBinary = True proto("Binary True",ProtFileName) FtpFileReq.UsePassive = passive proto("Passive True",ProtFileName) FtpFileReq.KeepAlive = False proto("Keep Alive True",ProtFileName) Try
'FTPReader und FTPWriter Dim Response As FtpWebResponse = FtpFileReq.GetResponse() proto("Get Response OK",ProtFileName) Dim FileWriter As IO.FileStream = New IO.FileStream(LocalFileName, IO.FileMode.Create) proto("IO FileStream OK",ProtFileName) Dim FTPReader As IO.Stream = Response.GetResponseStream() proto("IO Stream OK",ProtFileName)
'Daten lesen bis das Ende der Datei erreicht ist Using FTPReader proto("Reader Start",ProtFileName) Dim Buffer(2048) As Byte Dim read As Integer = 0 Do read = FTPReader.Read(Buffer, 0, Buffer.Length) FileWriter.Write(Buffer, 0, read) Loop While Not (read = 0) proto("Reader End",ProtFileName) End Using proto("End Using Reader",ProtFileName)
'Alles Schließen FTPReader.Close() proto("Reader close",ProtFileName) FileWriter.Close() proto("Writer close",ProtFileName)
'Nur wenn bis hier alles geklappt hat... If Response.StatusDescription <> "" Then proto("Status response OK",ProtFileName) returnstring = "OK" End If
Response.Close() proto("Response close",ProtFileName) Catch ex As Exception proto("Exception " & ex.Message,ProtFileName) returnstring = "#FEHLER:" & ex.Message End Try proto("End try",ProtFileName) End If proto("End if",ProtFileName) Return (returnstring) proto("Nach return",ProtFileName) End Function
Private Shared Sub proto(ByVal ausgabe As System.String, ByVal Prot As System.String) Try 'Dim file As String = "" Dim datei As System.IO.StreamWriter datei = System.IO.File.AppendText(Prot) datei.WriteLine(String.Format("{0} {1}", Date.Now, ausgabe)) datei.Close()
Catch ex As Exception
End Try End Sub
End Class
